name: Gold Medal Clicker Man 2014 - Fun Tap Counter Frenzy
name_original: Gold Medal Clicker Man 2014 - Fun Tap Counter Frenzy
description:
Ready for your own Gold Medal? Now you can have it and many more with Gold Medal Clicker 2014!

Who can click the most gold medals? Post your scores with #gmclick2014 and join in the international competition TODAY!

- Endless clicking fun
- Compete with your friends in “TIMED TRIALS”
- Buy power ups to speed up your progress
- DOWNLOAD NOW!!!
